examples: They only use the dining room when they have guests.
Solo usan el comedor cuando tienen invitados.
She had invited six guests to dinner.
Había invitado a seis personas a cenar.
She felt that she had to entertain her guests.
Sintió que tenía que entretener a sus invitados.
There were more than 100 wedding guests.
Hubo más de 100 invitados a la boda.
